name: Tommygotchi
description:
Take care of your very own Virtual boy!

Includes:
  • Four (4) minigames that give you money
  • A very specific cooking system
  • A library for finding  recipes and secrets!
  • A toy shop for decorating your living room
  • A boutique to get new outfits
  • Special items

And more, i think.

Try and fill every item on the lists menu! Important notes!
  • This game has no sound, if you hear something, it wasnt this
  • Just like real tamgotchis, this game has no save files, so get everything you can in one go!
  • This game has a Game Over event if any stat goes lower than 0
  • You only use the three buttons on the bottom!
  • All monetary compensation goes to me :). Please give
What does everything do?
  • Stats give you your current stats + money
  • Food gives acces to your fridge, where you press the center buttton to eat
  • Cooking makes you choose 4 ingredients for a new food! if you make a non specified recipe you wont waste your ingredients
  • Shower fills your hygiene meter
  • Sleep fills your energy meter
  • Travel makes you go to the park (fills social) and meet friends or go to a shop!
  • health fills your health
  • In Items you can choose a new outfit or look at your current books
  • Lists is where you know how much of something you have
  • In Play you can choose one of the 4 minigames!
  • Exit menu takes you back to the living room

If you liked this game please consider its predecesor "Virtual Ghostbur" or try the bullet hell game "Character Pattern", both are fangames

Thank you for playing this game! Please continue to support me in the future when i make original games!
